overview:
Cynthia Macy has been online since the late 90â€²s and has created several successful online businesses.

She is President and CEO of Cynthia, Inc, since 1995 and Manager of Day Trade Forex, LLC since 2004.

Cynthia started trading stock options in the late 90’s and moved to trading foreign currencies in 2001. In 2002, she wrote two forex trading manuals and marketed them online. She continues to trade forex and market forex-related products.

In addition, Cynthia is involved in internet marketing and social media marketing.

A U.S. citizen by birth, she has been living in Cancun, Mexico for the last three years on the beach and works out of her home.
